title: Tim Grover - Becoming Relentless
description: Ed Mylett interviews national bestselling author and CEO of ATTACK Athletics Tim Grover this week! Tim is world-renowned for his legendary work with elite champions and Hall of Famers, including Michael Jordan, Kobe Bryant, Dwyane Wade, and hundreds other NFL, MLB, NBA, and Olympic athletes, he is the preeminent authority on the science and art of physical and mental dominance and achieving excellence.
author: edwardmylett@yahoo.com (Ed Mylett)
